Uses of Package
org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery.dto  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery.inbox  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery.inbox.events  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery.usbserial  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mdns.discovery  
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery used by org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDiscoveryService
    The AbstractDiscoveryService provides methods which handle the DiscoveryListeners.
    DiscoveryListener
    The DiscoveryListener interface for receiving discovery events.
    DiscoveryResult
    The DiscoveryResult is a container for one result of a discovery process.
    DiscoveryResultBuilder
    The DiscoveryResultBuilder helps creating a DiscoveryResult through the builder pattern.
    DiscoveryResultFlag
    The DiscoveryResultFlag class specifies a list of flags which a DiscoveryResult object can take.
    DiscoveryService
    The DiscoveryService is a service interface which each binding can implement to provide an auto discovery process for one or more Thing s.
    DiscoveryServiceCallback
    Deprecated. 
    The use of this callback is deprecated. The Inbox is able to deal with updates. Incremental discovery should be handled internally by each DiscoveryService.
    DiscoveryServiceMock
    The DiscoveryServiceMock is a mock for a DiscoveryService which can simulate a working and faulty discovery.
    If this mock is configured to be faulty, an exception is thrown if the discovery is enforced or aborted.
    ScanListener
    The ScanListener interface for receiving scan operation events.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery used by org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery.dto 
    Class and Description
    DiscoveryResult
    The DiscoveryResult is a container for one result of a discovery process.
